resources.string: Enter the amount in Rupiah or Dollars and select the destination currency for conversion.

Currency Conversion is an application created by Raendhana Ilmi Vadhiasih, with the aim of being used as a programming assessment for mobile devices 

 Currency Conversion is an Android application that allows users to convert currency values from one form to another easily and quickly. This application supports various world currencies, including Dollars, Rupiah, Baht and Won so it is very useful for travel, study or international business needs.

This application was created for Mobpro class 1.
